title: SIEGE OF VALOR - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay
description:
Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay - Today we have a 2v2 siege battle!  England and Bulgaria prepare to attack the Teutonic Order and the Kingdom of Hungary.  Enjoy the Battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
